generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with a cobblestone texture, which is a road.
- sidewalk: There are clearly defined pedestrian paths on both sides of the road, separated by curbs, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, fitting the definition of buildings.
- vegetation: Several trees are visible along the sidewalks and street, qualifying as vegetation.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible between the sidewalk and the road, as well as along the edges, fitting the definition of terrain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy at the top of the image.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk, each carrying a backpack, fitting the definition of person.
- car: A black car is partially visible on the right side of the image, and other cars are parked along the street.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a red border and a blue background with a white "X" is visible on the right side of the image.
- pole: A small vertical pole is visible on the sidewalk near the traffic sign on the right side of the image.
